scripts.release:patch: git add -A && git diff --cached --quiet || git commit -m "chore: pre-release changes" && npm version patch -m "chore(release): %s" && bash scripts/update-env-version.sh && git push --follow-tags && gh release create v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") --generate-notes && bash scripts/post-release.sh
scripts.release:minor: git add -A && git diff --cached --quiet || git commit -m "chore: pre-release changes" && npm version minor -m "chore(release): %s" && bash scripts/update-env-version.sh && git push --follow-tags && gh release create v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") --generate-notes && bash scripts/post-release.sh
scripts.release:major: git add -A && git diff --cached --quiet || git commit -m "chore: pre-release changes" && npm version major -m "chore(release): %s" && bash scripts/update-env-version.sh && git push --follow-tags && gh release create v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") --generate-notes && bash scripts/post-release.sh
scripts.release:beta: git add -A && git diff --cached --quiet || git commit -m "chore: pre-release changes" && npm version prerelease --preid=beta -m "chore(release): %s" && bash scripts/update-env-version.sh && git push --follow-tags && gh release create v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") --prerelease --generate-notes && bash scripts/post-release.sh
